title: Has anybody else forgotten Rek`sai is a champion?
body: I was just looking through the champs today and noticed Rek`sai and realised that I honestly haven`t seen that champion all season. I can`t recall a single point where I played with or against the champion. It kinda sucks that such a cool champion is practically non-existent in the game, and I hope she gets some love soon.

replies.body: Who?
starlord come on man

I got her in ARURF and went lethality, the enemy mages just stood still and laughed as my q repeatedly hit them for less than 150 damage. (not saying arurf needs to be balanced but dear god is rek so bad there, her knockup cd isnt even sped up in that mode and everyone who has an ability to counter her R will always have it up by the time it lands)


Wanted to quit league lol.


BUT

I did see her in normals and on my team against a rengar, reksai won a bunch of duels with them.

Vi does everything Rek'Sai does but safer and with higher damage. There is no reason to pick Rek'Sai over Vi. Vi's cooldown on Q is so short that she can practically use it just as often as Rek'Sai's fully-upgraded tunnel networks.

I played a game of her yesterday.

Her early clear was so abysmally horrific that I'm not going to bother.

I feel like anything she does could be done by Vi, and better.

{{champion:421}} was the champ who made me start to like to jungle,, but the took away everything i liked about her
{{champion:19}}  does everything she does better now.

 i was pissed for the first year and a half after they ruined her, but once they released {{champion:19}} 's rework he took her place for me.

 they tok away everything i loved ahout her kit, her sustain her mobility, and moved it to {{champion:19}} .

there was a bunch of that that ruined her... 
 her E's damage is now complete shit
her tremor sense is so worthless now that its actaully more of as hindrence as by the time u see the spot they are no longer there and cant use  it productively without,

 she no longer can use tracker's knife to help with reduced vision...
her heal between camps is effectively gone.

 her knockup only hits 1 target,

 her useful ultimate as a mobility tool is now replace with an ultimate that over half the champ in the game can dodge just by dashing, and unlike with "skillshot" u can "predict the dodge" because its "point and click" its also her only decent source of damage and its her ultimate and its competly unreliable... the only GOOD part about it is the I-frame dodge.

 her Q aoe damage is also now effectivly worthless as well

Q above ground its aoe damage is shit ,. might as well not even be there
Q you can't land her q below ground with tremour sense alone
W Tremous sense is more of a hindrance now, and no longer has any effective heal
W knockup only hits one target now
E above ground, damage was gutted
E below ground, first useful ability in the whole freaking kit, but completly fucking outclassed by new shit like {{champion:141}}  and even older champs
R point and click that can miss, the i-frame is good, its basially a long ranged  "alpha strike" except the enemy can dodge it.


oh and did i mention.. trying to hit the plants unburrows her... so she cant use those effectively either


overall... she is complete trash now.

she was popular in pro play and got nerfed because of it. shes like {{champion:268}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:13}} etc. she is part of this pool of champs that were strong in pro play and riot were clumsy in the the way they chose to nerf them and then just forget about the, meanwhile {{champion:39}} {{champion:497}} {{champion:104}} and friends are allowed to be strong in pro play and solo queue and not see the same level of nerf for some reason.
Yep, I used to main azir and kalista and now I feel like a troll for playing them. Rek`sai was also my go-to jungler whenever I got the position. Clearly Riot is nerfing everything I play.

> [{quoted}](name=YuGiHo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qVJNybKA,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-11-06T09:48:10.370+0000)
>
> she was popular in pro play and got nerfed because of it. shes like {{champion:268}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:13}} etc. she is part of this pool of champs that were strong in pro play and riot were clumsy in the the way they chose to nerf them and then just forget about the, meanwhile {{champion:39}} {{champion:497}} {{champion:104}} and friends are allowed to be strong in pro play and solo queue and not see the same level of nerf for some reason.

As a {{champion:497}}  main, I just gotta say that his early game is pretty nerfed out right now. He is still strong mid/late, but his early game is rough.
{{champion:13}} still strong in solo que
Riot has, to them it only matters their new champions. Irelia, Aatrox, Akali Kaisa.

{{sticker:sg-janna}} She really is such a cool champion that's so bad rn. One time a rek'sai was chasing me as Elise and i was like screw it imma fight her at 50 hp, and i one shot her with my Q. I legit felt SO BAD!
Make her q deal %hp make her e an execute on minions gaining x amount of hp. Change her r to the old one so she has map pressure like she use to..
I saw one last night and thought "what is th---oh right, her" really for once forgot about a champion.
her tunnel shouldnt be a set distance, if they fixed that she would be great in the meta rn
i played her a few months ago, can barely kill two jg camps without almost dying.
Rek'Sai isn't fun because she should have had Cho'Gath-/Kog'Maw-esque lines, but instead just has grunting and hissing and that's annoying to listen to for 25+ minutes.
She's very strong when abusing Aftershock and building assassin.

More like "rekt" sai.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Player her in Norms once for the hell of it. She's a mess and I'm not shocked no one plays her. They ruined her kit.

She's not exactly a bad champ, but her gameplay just is wrong for me. 
She's all-out earlygame agression and then drops harder than udyr, her base damage is to low to be more than a knock-up bot later on if built tanky which really doesn't resonate with her fantasy, yet her kit is to predictable and clunky to allow squishy builts to be usefull for anything but snowball and/or pupstomping, especially since her base tankiness is pathetic aswell.
Experienced players can still crush the early on her and snowball games well, but that's all she has and it also limits her to jungle only.

If she could actually be a viable bruiser later on, i would love to play her top, she's a cool character and the kit would have potential, but her current tuneing is just bad for me.

I play her from time to time top lane and do fairly decently, even vs Illaoi i was the only one on my team who could deal with her really in one of the games. Everyone else just never avoided her ulti like i could, or at least survive it. Eventually she targetted the rest of my team enoigh that i stopped being able to, but i still got very close.

Her playstyle in top lane consists of mostly wave management, while mixing in her W for healing up a bit after fights (stack it up on minions). Titanic Hydra first item, Frozen mallet, and Bork with PTA or Conq depending on if it is a squishy or tanky champ.

> [{quoted}](name=Sire Hippington,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qVJNybKA,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2018-11-06T10:58:27.040+0000)
>
> She's not exactly a bad champ, but her gameplay just is wrong for me. 
> She's all-out earlygame agression and then drops harder than udyr, her base damage is to low to be more than a knock-up bot later.

And to make matters worse she can only knock up one champ at time, the rest are just displaced.
Yup, and she doesn't have the tankiness to do it multiple times in a fight anymore.

Don't expect her to be viable top anytime soon. The only reason she was on release was cuz her Q damage was blatantly overtuned and her ult was essentially a TP.

Her Q's base damages and AD ratios got nerfed 3 times within 6 patches of her release and more recently became a Bonus AD ratio, nerfing tanky builds (which she'd need to survive top).
Who again?
Nope, ive played her a few times, shes nice in top lane because she has a bit of built in sustain after the trades.

> [{quoted}](name=Wolfcub2000,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qVJNybKA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-05T23:07:08.854+0000)
>
> Nope, ive played her a few times, shes nice in top lane because she has a bit of built in sustain after the trades.

You must have been either fighting a seriously bad enemy top laner, or you played her at RELEASE when enemies do not know wtf she does.
Have you tried her recently? Try either PTA with titanic first, you can sustain off the waves, get easy trades, and after a few hits... just W. Heal up, repeat.

Sounds like a terrible version of Rengar top.

Literally everything Rek'Sai can do in lane Rengar can do better. At least his heal is meaningful.
Nope, seen her about 3 times really recently. Performed scary well every time.

> [{quoted}](name=S0lShadows,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qVJNybKA,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-11-05T22:54:42.462+0000)

I can`t recall a single point where I played with or against the champion. It kinda sucks that such a cool champion is practically non-existent in the game, and I hope she gets some love soon.

What’s sad is I used to really like her so I got her release skin, eternum rek’sai, and then they destroyed everything I liked about her.
Oof she is really really bad rn...
Reksai is like big effort low rewards.
{{champion:120}}
